mapper.insert: insert into orderdb(m_num, p_num, c_num, o_quantity, o_price, o_paymentstatus, o_deliverystatus, o_reviewstatus, o_totalprice, o_option, o_optiondetail, o_optionprice, o_date, o_image, o_number) values (#{m_num}, #{p_num}, null, #{o_quantity}, #{o_price}, #{o_paymentstatus}, null, null, #{o_totalprice}, #{o_option}, #{o_optiondetail}, #{o_optionprice}, now(), #{o_image}, null)
mapper.select: select * from orderdb where o_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
